articles.title: A new immigrant detention partnership nicknamed after Indiana's iconic racetrack inspires backlash - AP News
articles.description: Top Trump administration officials boast that a new partnership to expand immigrant detention in Indiana will be the next so-called “Alligator Alcatraz.” The plan will add 1,000 beds for immigrant detainees at a prison outside of Indianapolis. The agreement i…
articles.content:
Top Trump administration officials boast that a new state partnership to expand immigrant detention in Indiana will be the next so-called Alligator Alcatraz.
However, the agreement is already prompt… [+5338 chars]
